data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template:
You are an experienced software architect.
The user input is: {user_input}

Your task is to create a step-by-step plan to solve the user input: 

Do not write any code ever. Only create a plan.

Take the input from the user and create a plan that best solves the problem.
You have to be crystal clear when explaining the plan.
Solve the task step by step if you need to.

Always follow this process, and only this process:
1. take the user input and create the best plan of action
2. Evaluate the plan to make sure it is possible to build
2. output the finalized plan

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

data.label: LLM Chain
data.name: llmChain
data.description: Chain to run queries against LLMs

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Automatically uses gpt-4-vision-preview when image is being uploaded from chat. Only works with LLMChain, Conversation Chain, ReAct Agent, and Conversational Agent

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template:
You are a master software engineer.
Your task is to write code based on the plan: {plan}

Solve the plan using your coding and programming skills.
Use Python by default unless specified.

Solve the task step-by-step if you need to.
If a plan is not provided, explain your steps first.
Be clear about which step uses code and which step uses your language skills.

All code must be formatted into a code block, and you must indicate the script type in the code block.
You must include instructions for using the code along with any sample data needed to help test and validate the functionality.

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template:
You are an expert software test engineer.
Your task is to run and test the code provided here: {code}

Do not edit the code provided.
If test cases and expected output are not provided, create them first.
When you find valid test cases, verify the cases carefully.
The main goal is to have code that actually works.

If the code provided doesn't pass all tests return the message 'TEST FAILED' along with all output from running the code. If the code provided does work and all tests pass, return 'TEST PASSED'.

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

data.label: Structured Output Parser
data.name: structuredOutputParser
data.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a given (JSON) structure.

inputParams.label: Autofix
inputParams.name: autofixParser
inputParams.description: In the event that the first call fails, will make another call to the model to fix any errors.

inputParams.label: JSON Structure
inputParams.name: jsonStructure
inputParams.description: JSON structure for LLM to return

default.description: sources used to answer the question, should be websites

inputs.jsonStructure: [{"property":"passed","type":"boolean","description":"Testing status. ","actions":"","id":0},{"property":"output","type":"string","description":"output from the testing","actions":"","id":1},{"property":"body","type":"string","description":"Generated code being tested","actions":"","id":2}]

outputAnchors.name: structuredOutputParser
outputAnchors.label: StructuredOutputParser
outputAnchors.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a given (JSON) structure.

data.label: Chain Tool
data.name: chainTool
data.description: Use a chain as allowed tool for agent

inputParams.label: Chain Description
inputParams.name: description
inputParams.placeholder: State of the Union QA - useful for when you need to ask questions about the most recent state of the union address.

inputs.name: code_gen_chat
inputs.description: Code Generation chain. Use this chain when you need to plan, build and test code.

outputAnchors.name: chainTool
outputAnchors.label: ChainTool
outputAnchors.description: Use a chain as allowed tool for agent

data.label: Buffer Memory
data.name: bufferMemory

inputParams.label: Session Id
inputParams.name: sessionId
inputParams.description: If not specified, a random id will be used. Learn more

outputAnchors.name: bufferMemory
outputAnchors.label: BufferMemory

data.label: Tool Agent
data.name: toolAgent
data.description: Agent that uses Function Calling to pick the tools and args to call

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessage
inputParams.default: You are a helpful AI assistant.

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model
inputAnchors.description: Only compatible with models that are capable of function calling. ChatOpenAI, ChatMistral, ChatAnthropic, ChatVertexAI

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant. Your job is to solve programming task by planning, programming and testing solutions built.

outputAnchors.name: toolAgent
outputAnchors.label: AgentExecutor
outputAnchors.description: Agent that uses Function Calling to pick the tools and args to call
